original: Lorensson, Arnold Valter Lorens, jordbrukskonsulent, Visby, f. 13/11/02 i Kalmar lands förs. av August L. o. Emmy Karlsson. G. 32 m. Sonja Bo-quist. Barn: Gull f. 35, Stig 39. — Agronomex. i Alnarp 27. Lär. v. Flamra llantmannasik. 27-30, betinsp. på Gotl. f. Sv. Sockerfabr. A-B 30-39, tj :man i Mjölkpropagandan, Malmö, 39-40, jordbr :konsulent h. Gotl. läns hush :sällsk. i Visby sed. 40. Styr :led. i Gotl. Centralkassa f. Jordbr :kredit samt A-B Hampberedn. i Visby sed. 41, i Sv:es oljeväxtodl. centralfören. sed. 42, sekr. i Gotl. fröodlarefören. sed. s. å. Tidn :me’darb :’skap sed. 32, ledareskrib. f. lantbr :sidan i Gotl. Al-leh. samt krönikör i Jordbruk. Föreningsblad ised, 41.
translated: Lorensson, Arnold Valter Lorens, agricultural consultant, Visby, born on November 13, 1902 in Kalmar lands förs. to August L. and Emmy Karlsson. Married in 1932 to Sonja Boquist. Children: Gull, born in 1935, Stig, born in 1939. — Completed studies in agriculture in Alnarp in 1927. Worked as a teacher at Flamra llantmannasik. from 1927 to 1930, then became an inspector for Gotl. f. Sv. Sockerfabr. A-B from 1930 to 1939. Worked as a clerk in the Milk Propaganda Association in Malmö from 1939 to 1940, and as an agricultural consultant for Gotl. läns hush :sällsk. in Visby since 1940. Served as a board member in Gotl. Centralkassa f. Jordbr :kredit and A-B Hampberedn. in Visby since 1941, and in Sv:es oljeväxtodl. centralfören. since 1942. Served as secretary in Gotl. fröodlarefören. since the same year. Worked as a columnist for various newspapers since 1932 and as a leader writer for the agricultural section in Gotl. Al-leh. Also a columnist in Jordbruk. Föreningsblad since 1941.
